attributes.action: Lay out the red carpet - Brexit UK looks forwards to a Trump state visit.
attributes.additional_details:
Some of us in the UK actually like Donald Trump and what he is doing.

The news and media still do not understand why the UK voted to Brexit and why Donald Trump is president. Everyone is targeting Trump as he conducts his office but he is just the messenger and that is not fair. 

We reject Globalisation and support stricter immigration controls just as does the USA. Therefore we do not seek to alienate relations with the USA and welcome Donald Trump and the USA with open arms.
attributes.background: The news and media still do not understand why the UK voted to Brexit and why Donald Trump is president.
